body.bibl: Mathews, Edward George. “A First Glance at the Armenian ‘Prayers’ Attributed to Surb Eprem Xorin Asorwoy.” In Worship Traditions in Armenia and the Neighboring Christian East: An International Symposium in Honor of the 40th Anniversary of St Nersess Armenian Seminary, edited by Roberta R.
